imdb.plot outline: Tu Ashi Jawali Raha is a Marathi romantic drama television series starring Titeeksha Tawde, Siddharth Bodke, Gawali and Sulekha Talwalkar. The story revolves around Manva, a fiercely independent girl, who falls in love with Rajveer, who has a dominating nature. Over a period, Rajveer gets insecure and turns possessive which forces Manva to leave him. Will the lovers ever reunite?
imdb.title: Tu Ashi Jawali Raha
plot: _Tu Ashi Jawali Raha_ (qv) is a Marathi romantic drama television series starring Titeeksha Tawde, Siddharth Bodke, Gawali and Sulekha Talwalkar. The story revolves around Manva, a fiercely independent girl, who falls in love with Rajveer, who has a dominating nature. Over a period, Rajveer gets insecure and turns possessive which forces Manva to leave him. Will the lovers ever reunite?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
